title: Poll: Would you buy a new 15-inch MacBook Air?
content:
MacBook Air is probably one of the most popular Macs Apple has ever made, as it has a super compact design combined with a more affordable price. Although the MacBook Air is only available in a 13-inch model, recent rumors have pointed to a new 15-inch version coming in 2023. Now we want to know if you would buy a larger MacBook Air.

moreâ€¦

The post Poll: Would you buy a new 15-inch MacBook Air? appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Recent rumors have pointed to a new 15-inch MacBook Air coming in 2023. Now we want to know if you would buy a larger MacBook Air.
